name: Dungeon&Amalgam
description:
Play as an Amalgam. A chimera-like mixed magic creation.

Kill the enemy, take their body parts and become more powerful.

The fight was conducted on a round basis. Each round you have to choose three actions (each action you can do corresponds to a body part) against the opponent's three actions. 

Don't forget that when there are multiple body parts on a limb, you can use the mouse wheel to switch!

There is no ending yet. But you can still kill as many enemies as you can and see what kind of monsters you can make!
